title: Request for Correctional Mental Health Staff Directory and Contact Information (Department of Corrections)

communications.subject: Iowa Open Records Law Request: Request for Correctional Mental Health Staff Directory and Contact Information (Department of Corrections)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Iowa Open Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting a list of currently employed mental health professionals within your state's Department of Corrections or its subsidiary agencies, as well as their contact information.

Specifically, I am requesting:

- Full names
- Job titles
- Assigned correctional facility
- Government-issued email addresses
- Government-issued phone numbers (direct desk numbers if available, otherwise department phone numbers with or without extensions)
- Department/division (e.g. Behavioral Health, Mental Health Services)

This request applies to the following roles: rehabilitative program coordinators, licensed psychologists, psychiatrists, clinical social workers, and other licensed mental health professionals serving incarcerated populations in state-operated facilities.

If available, I request this information be provided in a machine-readable format such as CSV or Excel.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Andrew Ma

communications.subject: [Document Released to Requester] State of Iowa public records request #25-1850
communications.communication:
State of Iowa ************************************************************************ A document has been released for record request #25-1850 along with the following message: Thank you for your recent request (Request 25-1850). The Iowa Department of Corrections (DOC) charges for open record requests. Our office provides 30 minutes of staff review time without charge. Beyond that, our office charges based on the hourly wage of the staff member(s) handling the request. Accordingly, this request will take 4 hours of staff time with the first 30 minutes at no charge. Please review the attached charge form to determine if you would like to proceed with the request. Once payment is received, we will process your request.  Please make payment by check or money order to: Treasurer, State of Iowa Payment can be sent to: Iowa Department of Corrections  Attention: Jen Rathje 510 East 12th st. Des Moines, IA 50319 Thank you, Iowa Department of Corrections * Copy Fee Charge_Request 25 1850.pdf ************************************************************************ Questions about your request? Reply to this email or sign in to contact staff at State of Iowa.

Technical support: See our help page
